name: Fairy Costume (TuTu Dress)
description: Your little one will certainly steal the show trick-or-treating in this amazing costume! Made with over 100 yards of tulle, this fairy costume comes in your choice of color combination and can be made to fit any size! The satin-wrapped band and halter top make this costume stand-out among all the "off the rack" costumes in stores. All flowers are handmade with jewel centers, too! Comes in standard sizes (6M, 12M, 18M, 2T, etc) or CUSTOM-MADE to your child's measurements! Costume comes with the following: 1. Halter-style TuTu Dress with Satin-Wrapped Band and jeweled flowers. 2. Coordinating Fairy Wings adorned with jeweled flowers (not pictured) Add-Ons: 1. Jeweled Flower Hair Clippie $4 (pictured) 2. Jeweled Flower Hair Clippie on Crochet Headband $5 3. Braided Head Wreath with Jeweled Flowers $10 Want to see more pictures? Click here. Colors available are all shown "in stock" here. You may choose TWO. Colors shown in photo are Shocking Pink and Fuschia.

name: Halloween Panel Dress
description: This adorable panel dress is made from four different "spooky patterned" fabrics and features 4 panels on each side. Satin-ribbon shoulder straps, boo-tiful shoulder bows, and "Mommy and Me" Ghosties on the skirt make this Halloween dress absolutely SPOOK-tacular! Can be made in standard children's sizes (12M, 18M, 24M, etc.) or CUSTOM-MADE to your child's measurements! Dress falls mid-calf. Please email me at elizabeth (at) thecraftycharlestonian (dot) com with any questions. Want to see more pictures? Click here.

name: Halloween Ghost Hairbow
description:
These adorable Ghost Hairbows will surely get your little princess tons of compliments this year. They're the perfect accessory to our Halloween Panel Dress! Each ghost has adorable googly eyes and an orange, jeweled hairbow on her head. 

(This listing is for the Ghost Hairbows pictured at the TOP...but we offer Ghost Clippies as well!)

Hairbows can be attached to Alligator Clips or Standard Barrettes.

name: Halloween Ghost Clippie
description:
These adorable Ghosts will surely make your daughter's hair look Boo-tiful this Halloween....and they're the perfect accessory to our Halloween Panel Dress! 

Each Ghost comes with googly eyes and an orange, jeweled hairbow in her "ghost hair." 

Ghost Clippies come on a lined alligator clip with "sticky" so they'll even stay put in fine or thin hair!

Ghost Clippie is pictured AT BOTTOM...but we offer Ghost Hairbows also!
